original: Ekholm, Carl William, kyrkoherde, Locknevi, f. 16/7/91 i Betul, Indien, av missions pastor Frans E. o. h. h. f. Price. G. 18 m. Ingeborg Söderbäck. Barn: Laisa f. 23, Per 26, Margareta 28. ~ Stud:ex. i Upps. 12, teok fil. ex. 13, teoi. kand., prakt. teol. prov o. prästv. f. ärkestiftet 16. Tf. kom-min. i Vätö 17, kommin. i Ingatorp 21, kyrkoh. i Locknevi sed. 29. Ordf. i kyrko- o. past:stämmorna, i styr. f. Locknevi folkbibi. ’samt i Locknevi skolstyr. Riksantikv. omb. f. Locknevi socken. Finl. med. f. hum. verks.
translated: Ekholm, Carl William, parish priest, Locknevi, b. 16/7/91 in Betul, India, son of missionary pastor Frans E. and his wife h. h. f. Price. Married in 1918 to Ingeborg Söderbäck. Children: Laisa b. 1923, Per b. 1926, Margareta b. 1928. Education: Studentexamen (university entrance exam) in Uppsala 1912, theological and philosophical exams in 1913, theological candidate, practical theology exam and ordained in the archdiocese in 1916. Temporary assistant minister in Vätö 1917, assistant minister in Ingatorp 1921, parish priest in Locknevi from 1929. Chairman of the church and parish meetings, the board of the Locknevi public library, and the Locknevi school board. National antiquarian delegate for Locknevi parish. Received a degree in humanities.

structured.name: Carl William Ekholm
structured.description: Riksantikv. omb. f. Locknevi socken. Finl. med. f. hum. verks.
